Text: Thank you for this. Works great. +1 rep
Perfect upload.  Easy setup, no hassle.  Thank you.
"Update request denied, please check your licence and contact Slysoft support!" is the error I'm getting every time I start AnyDVD, any idea on how to fix it?

This wasn't working for me, I was also getting the "Update request denied" message. I also tried ChattChitto's, same thing. I found a 7.0.4.1 Beta from Sentry, worked great. Probably not Thumper's fault, Slysoft probably did something. Windows 7 64.

Break your Internet connection completely before installing. Pull out the plug to your PC or router. When the program starts, go to Settings and untick the Check for updates option.
The reason for this is that the program immediately runs to its homepage to register your IP. If you have  have made a failed installation, it may remain in your computer's register and has to be removed with a registry cleaner before you can make a new installation.

For those having problems, listen to Kuthumi.

You can also add this to your hosts file before installing. It should do the trick.
"C:WindowsSystem32driversetchosts"

#Slysoft
127.0.0.1	slysoft.com
127.0.0.1	secure.slysoft.com
